column5: Latest;Pailin: Two men were injured in an explosion when an excavator struck a UXO at 4:40 pm on the 27th of May 2020
column6: at the entrance to Chamkar Moun Resort
column7: in the village of Boru Tbong
column9: Pailin City.------The men had been hired to clear farmland.------Following the incident
column10: the provincial police chief led forces to inspect the scene
column11: finding another explosive in the ground.------Both victims have been sent to a provincial hospital for treatment. A demining official (CMAC) said the remaining ordnance was a 75 mm shell.------KOHSANTEPHEAP
